body: Is it possible to have night vision put into avikade yaml?
body_tagged: Is it possible to have night vision put into avikade yaml?
title: Night Vision in Red Alert?

replies.body: How about being able to toggle the visibility of players in Minotaur so I don't have to run in someone's head while attempting to parkour.

This is actually a question.

i always spell Avicade Avikade because I'm cool that way.

so no this doesn't go in the feedback section :)

replies.body:
Yea it's possible.
just define a loadout with the effect: night_vision
